amendment.description: To rescind certain amounts appropriated for U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement and certain changes to Medicaid.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4290, under the order of 1/30/2026, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 18.

action.text: Amendment SA 4290 proposed by Senator Sanders. To rescind certain amounts appropriated for U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement and certain changes to Medicaid.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4290 proposed by Senator Sanders.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 4290, under the order of 1/30/2026, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 18.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4290, under the order of 1/30/2026, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 18.
